def main():
    t = int(input())
    for _ in range(t):
        L, v, l, r = list(map(int, input().split()))
        numbefore = (l-1)//v
        numduring = r//v
        numafter = L//v
        print(numafter - (numduring - numbefore))

def __starting_point():
    main()

		cl+=v
